title: Ping and Lag
body: I have had ping and fps isssues ever since the June in season 6. But now it is appearing more often to the point in the past week I haven't had a single game with lower than 1 thousand ping and without a fps spike. I realized that no matter how many times I try to lower my ping or try to speed up my computer or get a new one. League will always lag, even with Riot trying as hard as they can. I have also realized that people report you if you do bad even when you say you are lagging. So I beg Riot to release a way to show your ping and fps like you can show your cooldowns, that way hopefully I will avoid some reports and we can finally tell who is lagging and who is just feeding.

replies.body: League requires a constant connection, so it's certainly possible to experience issues if your network is a bad or slow connection.  You can use our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) if you ever want to get a reading on your network and how it's performing in-game.  I also suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection so you can have better experiences in game.  Hope that helps!
